-Good game play system but also have many bug that will make your very rare item useless

in the morning this is not much of a problem but after 7-8 P.M. ?
you are lucky if it take you less than 30 minute to find match
you can easily spend 2 hour spam "ready" button with your friend for fun while got a chance to play 10-20 minute in game for once in a while.

This game have a potential but if you can't player with your friend then why bother put "play with friend mode" there

It takes about 2 good games to level up your survivor in this game. I am currently at 12 hours and my survivor rank is 7...now before you think I'm a bad player (which I assure you I am not) I'll tell you a little about what you're getting into buying this game...

If you don't have any steam friends that have this game and you will more often then not being playing by yourself then this game is absolutly fantastic and you're going to have a lot of fun.

If you have 1 or more buddies you will be playing this game with well...I hope you guys have a lot to talk about because it goes from being a survival horror game in which you try to outrun a killer to a campfire simulator.

"Oh Storm what do you mean a campfire simulator?"

Well sexy one let me tell you...while you are trying to ready up multiple times for a lobby for it to say searching for a game for about 3-8 minutes only to cancel out and have to reready up (god forbid one of your heathen friends goes for a drink or a pee pee time because then you have to wait longer for him to come ready up as well) all of the survivors are just standing around this campfire waiting for a lobby to get into so they can take a knife to the face and run around boo hoo'ing and leaving a blood trail all the way up to a closet you think you're safe in.

You want to play a killer! Well all be dang gum you just broke the game, you'll get into gameplay instantly and frequently. Me personally I like playing as a survivor as I have more fun that way, but it's come down to me and my buddy just playing as survivors in different games now. He has to listen to me talk about my game and all the fun and good times I am having and vice versa. It's ruining our friendship, our bonding time and who we are as men. We will never be the same after this! I left him on a hook one time because I was so used to playing with random people--ya imagine having to deal with that in teamspeak he didn't talk to me for like 15 minutes!

But for real when myself, kurk and tyler was all playing trying to play as three...in 2 and a half hours we got into 2 games...not kidding or being over dramatic at all...literally 2 games in close to 3 hours. 

On the brightside we got to know each other very well, kurk is a real life friend and tyler is a buddy I've been gaming with for almost 7 years now. I found out tonight he is 6'6" (holy sh!! I know!) we talked about beer, woman, politics, the universe, who would have what superpower if we got struck by lightening, who's dad could beat up who's dad, what kind of food we ate in the last 3 months...

10/10 would play campfire simulator again and again

The game is incredibly fun and it pains me to not recommend it but there are a few big reasons why I can't give this game a thumbs up as of yet.

1. Survive with friends.

Survive with friends is a lot of fun, it adds a new element to playing survivor as you can communicate with your fellow stragglers (albeit you need to use a third party VOIP like teamspeak or discord). The problem is it's incredibly tedious and honestly near impossible to get a game via survive with friends. You have to re-ready up every time the group fails to find you a game, I think in a 1 hour period me and my friends pressed the ready button around about 70-80 times before we got a game, the worst part is if the lobby you find then crashes or the killer leaves, you have to start the process all over again. I've spent more time in queue spamming the ready button like a maniac than actually playing the game with a 2 hours session being 1.75 hours in queue and like 15 mins in game.

2. Glitches and bugs

There's a crazy amount of game breaking bugs in the game, I'm fine with the occasional graphical bug but when playing killer and I get glitched into and then permanently stuck in a pallet, it gets pretty damn annoying, also a few of the offerings don't work, I used the one that's meant to spawn as far from the killer as possible and I ended up spawning only a few meters away from him while my friends were on the other side of the map. There's also many other game breaking and just plain iritating bugs in the game but if I were to list all of them this already lengthy review would become a multi-volume novel.

3. Game stability

This game crashes. All the time. You also lose any offerings, add ons and items you were using in the match when the game crashed and you also lose pip (the means by which you rank up in game). I thought at first my game was just unstable and only me, after playing with friends and watching streamers, turns out the game is just generally unstable to the point of insanity. Frankly I'd call my schizophrenic grandmother more consistently stable than this game.

4. Hackers

I expected some sort of hackers to be in this game, almost all online games have them. However I thought the anti-cheat would at least prevent mindlessly blatant hacks, like speed hacks and noclip hacks. I recently played with a hacker who was playing wraith, and on that day I learned that the wraith could fly. Hacking is a serious problem in this game and the anti-cheat is pretty much useless, reporting should do the trick but that doesn't get me back the pip and items I lost, which hurts since I already lose enough as is to game crashes and other glitches.


Conclusion.

If the developers fix these 4 things than I'd absolutely love to give the game a thumbs up, I really do enjoy the gameplay in spite of these things but I would never recommend this game to someone else in its current form, there's just more negatives than positives right now, which is dissapointing since the game is cool in concept and is incredibly enjoyable when you get the rare match that isn't bugged or hacked. I could complain about game balancing as well on that note, but that's not the focus of this review, I see no point in even touching on game balance when the game is barely even stable. I hope the devs fix these issues in the near future so I can change this to a thumbs up.

Dead by Daylight: Gute Spiele Idee, Mittelmäßige Umsetzung, und dass Schlimmste Lobby System seit der Erfindung des Internets. 

In Dead by Daylight Spielen im Normal Fall entweder 3-4 komplett neue Egoistische Spieler gegen einen High Level Killer mit OP Perks. Oder 2-3 high-level OP Team player + einen komplett neuen Spieler gegen einen Spieler der insgesamt ca. 0-5 mal Killer gespielt hat. Dead by Daylight scheint eine Komplett "No fun 4 you" Politik zu fahren, den anstatt ein funktionierendes Lobby System zu Programmieren wird erstmals ein DLC veröffentlicht mit einer Killerin und einer neuen überlebenden. 

Jetzt aber mal ein bisschen sachlicher: Das Lobby System ist quasi nicht vorhanden, es hat sich zwar von der warte zeit verbessert (Mann muss nicht mehr 20-30 mal auf "finde eine Lobby drücken biss es klappt) aber auf die ränge wird immer noch komplett geschissen! z.B: Ich wahr in meinem letzten game der Killer mit Level 2 und rang 20 (die Ränge gehen von 20-1) und habe als Gegner einen Rang 1 Spieler so wie 2 Rang 10 und einen rang 5 Spieler bekommen. Da ist der Loose von vornherein klar. Da die Gegner nicht nur erfahrener sind sondern auch mehr perks und bessere perks haben. Solche Spieler haben fast immer einen Sprint boost von 150% für 3 Sekunden... Das ist ein fast schon unverschämter vor teil gegen einen low level Killer. Und wenn ich als survivor gespielt habe hat mich in 5 games erst einmal jemand vom hacken geholt. Es wird fast immer, nicht mal versucht. Das Team play ist quasi nicht vorhanden. Wenn die Entwickler sich auf das konzentrieren würden was die Spieler Stört wäre es ein tolle Spiel aber so wie es jetzt ist muss ich sagen das ich den 6 Jahren in dehnen ich gemobbt wurde mehr Spaß hatte.

В игре куча багов и ужасное комьюнити, разработчики могут только пиздеть о фиксе багов и прочем, на деле же всё ужасно. Перк Лори, Решительный удар, как был глюканным,так и остался. Сколько пиздят про фикс кемперов-всё также, стоит в притык и дышит тебе в лицо.Про комьюнити вообще молчу, найти общий язык с этими ограниченными созданиями просто невозможно, как бы ты хорошо не отыграл- тебя обольют грязью. Не важно как игра пройдёт:кемперил ты или нет. Сейчас появился баг , то что любой маньяк может взять бензопилу или что-то ещё, встречается и по 2 маньяка в игре . После таких багов просто напрочь отбивается желание заходить в эту игру , и уж темболее в неё играть. Уже около месяц эта херня происходит-разрабы положили толстый вонючий член. Какой интерес играть против маньяка с связью( Даёт способность видить выживших на х расстоянии) ? Чем вообще занимаются разработчики? Они сами то играют в свою игру? Не рекомендую приобретать в ближайшее время , игру надо довести до ума. Думаю ближе к лету до разработчиков дойдёт то , что надо фиксить баги и заниматься балансом, а не делать платные DLC
挺好玩的，自从玩了杀机，lol都不玩了。刚开始觉得很可怕，玩的时候旁边有点动静我都吓的半死，后来有了开黑，和小伙伴们一起玩的时候就不觉得可怕了，还很搞笑。这不是恐怖游戏，是搞笑游戏。哈哈哈哈哈！

Bon je vais pas y aller par 4 chemins, nombres d'avis ont déjà décrit les bases de ce jeu donc "blablabla 4 vs 1 blablabla un tueur, 4 survîvants blablabla" maintenant je vais passer au point "pourquoi je ne recommande pas ce jeu EN L'ETAT". 

Premièrement le déséquilibre entre survivants et tueurs, les survivants sont littéralement beaucoup trop avantagés par rapport aux tueurs de par leur nombreuses compétences mais aussi de par le fait que celles des tueurs (les plus efficaces en tout cas) mette un tant fou avant d'être drop et encore parfois c'est clairement pas le genre de compétence qui nous aide en parties.

Deuxièmement, des serveurs absoluments pas optimisé pour un sous dans le sens où un prestige 20 va se retrouver contres des prestiges 1, 8, 11 etc donc carrément aucune chance de faire ne serai-ce qu'une victime.

Troisièmement, certains tueurs ont des capacités spécial qui doivent être vraiment revues ou optimisées. Pour vous faire un rapide résumé, le piégeur à (selon moi) la capacité spécial la plus utile du jeu c'est-à-dire posé des pièges a loup où il le souhaite. Le spectre a (toujours selon moi) la plus inutile de toute, certe sa le rend invisible mais son invisibilité met 4 ans à s'enlever et en plus sa nous ralenti dans un bruit de cloche absolument pas discret. Le montagnard possède une tronçonneuse qui est entre le bien et le merdique, tout dépend. L'infirmière quand à elle peut se téléporter, certain joueur considère cette téléportation comme cheaté dans le sens où il est possible d'attaquer après s'être téléporté MAIS ce qu'il faut savoir c'est que cette téléportation étourdi l'infirmière (étourdissement qui dure plus longtemps si une attaque à été porté) et est aussi vachement imprécise.

Et enfin quatrièmement, les tueurs doivent accrocher leurs proies sur des crochets, hors un survivants a la possibilité de détruire ces crochets et comme il n'y a pas de règle qui interdit aux joueurs de prendre ce survivants, on se retrouve avec une équipe de 4 même mecs et du coupsje suis sortie d'une partie où il n'y avais tout simplement plus de crochets alentours, les seuls restant étaient ceux de la cave, cave qui n'est bien entendu pas à 2 pas de l'endroit où vous capturez une victime et comme les survivants peuvent se débattre pour que vous les lachiez je vous laisse deviner la partie magnifique que sa a donné...

Donc voilà même si j'aime beaucoup ce jeu, en l'état actuel je peux pas le recommander, c'est un peu bête à dire mais ce jeu me fais penser a Evolve et ses nombreux problèmes du même genre.

高级躲猫猫，不错的环境构造，但是优化比较差，中等画质放在别的优化比较好的游戏里，可能GF820M都能比较流畅的带起来，但是这边最低画质也需要较好一些的显卡。这是个需要耳机的游戏，一个好的耳机可以让你的追杀或逃脱成功率增大很多，同时也让其氛围营造更好。不过确实对新手不太友好，当你还是一个一级角色的20小白的时候，你就已经有可能，碰上绿8的人带着几个紫色技能，在你毫无准备的情况下，带着你遛弯，或者直接让你团灭，要有被屠幼的心理准备。

Dead by Lobby or Dead by Lag Cheats. It's not even really that it spends time for matchmaking but it's so buggy you spend 4 to 5 times just trying to get it to find a match.
This game has it's moments and it is great fun. Assuming you want to wait for it.
Since the Killer hosts the server you get to deal with 100's of lag cheaters...

For anyone interested in this game as a HORROR GAME, and not a game about grinding for ranks and perks and feverishly working over the very fine details of how to play the game as the absolute best survivor/killer, then I advise you have a look at some of the streams of the game itself. I should have gone off of my intuition and avoided getting the game, but I have a habit of giving things the benefit of the doubt. Oh well.

This game CAN be exciting to play with 4 other friends, however unlikely it is that you'll get so many people you know to both own and play the game with you.

[UPDATE]

I have requested a refund for the game. Given the fact that most of my playtime was spent in conflict with the game's faulty matchmaking system, I'm hoping the 5 hours of playtime will be overlooked.

Secondary warning to everyone. You will have to wait for your matches. Also, accept the risk of your experience being ruined by a killer who decides to camp you until you've been eliminated from the game and are forced back in progress and have to wait another unreasonable length of time for another match. This was the last straw for me.

10/10 would spend hours trying to get into a game only to get "Failed to join a lobby" again, its the best part of the game

*UPDATE  12/28/19*
Games fixed for the most part, lots of fun with friends but can get repetitive at times. 9/10

I can't stop playing this game, but in no right can I recommend it to other players. This is by far one of the buggiest games I've ever touched. Maybe if the Developers focused more on fixing their mathcmaking and other bugs in the game instead of creating new content it would be a different story. Constantly I pull pallets down on killers to have them appear on the other side. Trying to dodge through a window, you better be 50 feet on the other side or else they can still hit you. Last, but definitely not least. How are we still playing on a host system? With the amount of sales this game has had, they should have dedicated servers. Instead, your entire game experience is dependent on whether the killer has a good network connection.

Back to a thumbs up. Game entry much improved.



This game is broken. Can't get into a multiplayer games but for rare instances. Sick of the bugs. I really want it to work well because it's fun to survive with friends...and murder them. Get it together guys.
Love-hate moments 8/10 IGN#

[h1]First off...[/h1]
The game has its quirks and clearly not perfect. Although addicting, it seems to be attracting more negative feedback rather than positive. I for one, approve of this game and would recommed or buy it for a friend. 

[h1]The Killer?[/h1]
I'm not a good killer, and I've ran into a few games (where not all games are like this, mind you) where survivors boast 'surviving' when they successfully escape. I know the point of the game is to kill all the survivors, but I also enjoy the entertainment and thrill the game brings. Reaching 10k for a pip is a win to me regardless if all 4 survivors escape. I'm also not one to "patrol" or "camp" unless it's blatantly obvious that survivors are around me (i.e.; seeing scratch marks or just finding one behind a tree). I enjoy the rush of preventing the generators being popped and if I see someone using infinites, I just move on to the next guy, or, ultimately let them escape. No point in boosting someones ego for using a spot a killer can't counter (unless you're the trapper).

[h1]The survivor?[/h1]
I'm a rank one survivor and although I've put in 200+ hours into this game, I have to say that the thrill of hiding from killers is amazing especially if they don't see you in plain sight. I admit that camping killers are a massive downside to this game, however, I also firmly believe that the developers are working to counter any patrol or camping that is done to prevent altruism. I hate infinites although necessary to avoid getting captured by the killer, I also understand why they're put into the game (i.e.; random map spawns with blimp window blocked but now tractor has pile of hay which could ultimately be used as an infinite (although I have seen killers counter this fairly easily)). 

[h1]...surviving?[/h1]
It boils down to how well you know to keep yourself hidden from a first person camera. The killer has a lot of advantages when it comes to spotting a survivor such as scratch marks or even breathing. However, the survivor has great advantages as well to counter that such as premonition, spine chill, and iron will, which are amazing indicators and techniques to quiet your character. 

Is this fair to a Level 50 killer who somehow stays Rank 20 and plays with new Rank 20 survivors? Of course not because the killer would have unfair advantages and perks at his grasp but it is also likewise. I know survive with friends is an amazing feature but does bring some disadvantages but again, boils down to how good you are at finding a survivor or hiding from a killer (I would know as I have had rank 20 killers, fresh with no perks, take me down).

[h1]Tl;dr[/h1]
I approve of the game and what the developers are accomplishing. It seems equally balanced unless you get players who play 24x7 and know how to operate a killer such as the Nurse.  

[h1]Other tid bits...[/h1]
The matchmaking seems fixed to an extent. I have had to press 'Ready' several times just to be returned to the lobby which is really annoying [08/29/2016]. I've seen more than 4 survivors join an already started game a lot more recently now than I have in the past. The anti-cheat system needs to develop and learn quicker (my personal rant). And finally, the lag problem needs to be fixed. There's too many Koreans playing on U.S. download regions (or that's what it feels like). I do agree that they need to get a beefy server and host it that way (my opinion: have survivors join and would wait for a killer, or vice versa, so the matchmaking process isn't so borked).

first of all the online matchmaking needs to be fixed asap its been broken since it came out. the gameplay is fun but very repetitive maybe some new game modes and content would be great. dont get me wrong its a fun game overall but after about 1-2 hours i close it because of repitition.

The mmr needs to be fixed and the game needs some serious reworks done for both killers and survivors for it to be playable and fair.

정말 재미있는 게임입니다. 생존자에서 하시던 살인마 역활을 하시던간에 즐거움을 느낄수 있습니다.
생존자측에서 플레이 하실경우에  팀플레이와 공포를 느끼시며 게임을 즐기실수 있으며
때때로 팀원을 버리는 과감한 선택이 필요하기도 합니다.
살인마를 플레이 하실경우 물론 공포감은 없지만 생존자들을 줄여나갈때의 쾌감과 
승리를 만끽할수 있는 좋은 게임입니다. 비슷한 게임으로 이볼브가 있지만, 이볼브처럼 큰 용량을 필요료 하지도 않으며, 
속칭 '조선컴'에서도 돌어갈만한 괜찮은 게임입니다.

They refunded all the points I should have. Love the DEV.

Great game, Great concept, Great atmosphere, very enjoyable. Obviously a game like this (asymetrical Horror) is going to have its issues with glitches, bugs, lag, etc. as do all, this game is no different. THis game though strives past its issues. It creates a sense of dread and excitement (if you are a survivor) and power and it feeling of imposing your will (as a Killer). All in all this game gives you exactly what you pay for and then some, and with its updates and dlc's it comes as no surprise I would recommend this game to any horror fan!
Still waiting for them to flick the switch for Proton EAC support

Great game with bugs that need fixing.  Matchmaking is a little wonky and the developers need to change their queueing system because the "Failed to join game" issue is bugging a lot of players in the community, especially if they are playing with friends.  I still enjoy the game even though I get 15 FPS when I play as a survivor and 8 FPS with killer (LOL) because it gets really intense when you are being chased by the killer.  Your adrenaline starts pumping even more if you have an excellent team that block the hits for you or your teammates and you all escape.  As the killer it is just satisfying when a survivor steps on your trap or falls for your trick by faking them out in those "barricade" situations.  Dead by Daylight is a game where even the tiniest mistakes can screw you up which really forces you to think outside the box to prevent being punished and that is why I love this game.

Great game! love the mechanics in the game and how it's played out, very fun game to play with friends and it gets your adrenaline pumping when you risk your items and points to save others from the killer or when your about to escape the exit gates!

allthough its a very small developer team i think the game is very good and its getting better after each patch that comes out.

Only cons is that the matchmaking system at the moment sucks so fucking much, you can go several minutes up to 30 minutes without getting any match (Survive With Friends) and there is some bugs of course!
But the game hasn't been polished yet so that is to concider!. Overall i recommend this game hihgly to those who can tolerate waiting for matches if you play it coop.

But i like it so very much it's addictive and the leveling system is just great.

Hier ist mein kleines aber feines Review :)
Dead by Daylight ist ein cooles HORROR-Game.
Egal ob alleine oder mit freunden im TeamSpeak, einfach nur geil!
Es gibt 4 Killer, die alle auf ihrer eigenen Art einzigartig sind.

1. Fallensteller    | Zusammengefasst ein breiter Mann der Bärenfallen in der Map verteilt um unschuldige Spieler zu fangen.
2. Geist            | Zusammengefasst ein Killer der mithilfe einer Glocke sich fast ganz unsichbar machen kann.
3. Hinterwäldler    | Zusammengefasst ein Etwas das seine Beute mit einer angsteinflösenden Kettensäge das Leben zum Albtraum macht.
4. Krankenschwester | Zusammengefasst eine Krankenschwester die sich schnell hin und her teleportieren kann und so ihre Gegner niemals entkommen lässt.

Nun zu den Überlebenden. 5 Überlebende die eigene Eigenschaften besitzen um zu überleben.

1. Dwight Fairfield | Ein Brillenträger der gerne im Team unterwegs ist und davon provetiert.
2. Meg Thomas       | Eine damals Sportlerin die mit Perks die Sie noch schneller macht glänzt.
3. Jake Park        | Viel übung gab ihn die gabe, viele Sachen wie z.B. Harken zu sabotieren.
4. Claudette Morel  | Eine dunkelhäutige Frau die sich mit heilung auskennt deswegen sich z.B. selber heilen kann.
5. Nea Karlsson     | Die neue in der Trupper der Überlebenden! Sie schleicht gerne durch das Grass und hebt sich von den anderen ab z.B. weil sie in der Hocke schneller laufen kann.

Zusammengefasst ist es ein super Spiel und ich kann es wirklich jeden ans Herz legen und dank regelmäßige Updates die neuen Content liefern.

Es gibt etwas Negatives.. was mich und viele Spieler sehr aufregt. Das Problem als Überlebender Lobbys zu finden. Meistens findet man sofort eine Lobby aber manchmal dauert es bis zu 10min. Aber die Entwickler arbeiten schon dran. Es hat sich schon vieles geändert, wie zum Release.
Ce jeu est bien par son gameplay de spam le boutton "prêt". Faites des fils d'attente! ça devien hyper ennuient pour être poli.

Ja, das Spiel macht Spaß...

Leider kann ich dennoch keine Kaufempfehlung aussprechen. Das Lobbysystem ist der Horror! Schätzungsweise verbringt man 1/3 der Spielzeit damit Gruppen zu finden... 

Keine Gruppe gefunden...
Spielbeitritt misslungen...
Alternativ fliegt man auch gern mal aus einer Lobby oder wird grundlos disconnectet...

Das verdirbt einem den Spaß an diesem an sich tollen Spiel!

'Sobald das Problem behoben wird bin ich durchaus gewillte das Spiel angemessen zu Bewerten!'

Ende der Durchsage
